attributes.action: buy the annual poppy crop of Afghanistan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is an outrage that proceeds from the cultivation and sale of poppies for heroin production goes to the Taliban and to local warlords in Afghanistan.  The amount of money required to buy all production is miniscule compared to what is being spent on this conflict.  The British government should immediately change it's policy and buy all poppy production.
